name: Twilight's Basics in Magic and Friendship 1.4.3 Remake
name_original: Twilight's Basics in Magic and Friendship 1.4.3 Remake
description: Welcome to Twilight's Basics in Magic and Friendship 1.4.3 Remake! This is a remake of the original mod by ValenGames that was trashed a long time ago, so this is a remake with more modded textures, modded text, modded sounds and secret codes.
